p: To explore whether STT3A or STT3B plays roles in productive viral entry and early infection, STT3A –, STT3B –, and WT cells were infected with rLCMV/LASV GPC at a multiplicity of infection (MOI) of 0.01. We examined intracellular levels of viral nucleoprotein (NP) at 8 h postinfection (hpi), at which time point LASV has reportedly finished entry ( 57). As shown in Fig. 5A, no significant changes were observed, suggesting that knockout of STT3A or STT3B did not affect viral entry or early infection.
